text: You can't beat this location !  If you want mouth watering pizza you gotta try this place.  So many different styles the best is the one with smoked meat.  The fact that they have dark gravy you know they know what they are doing.
Best pizza in town. The chicken wings are delicious too. The owners are super friendly. Highly recommended, good price and good service!
If you are looking for great Pizza and poutine as well as many more like subs and wings then you found the right place. This hidden gem never disappoints.
